name: UITabBarItemAppearance
desc: An object for customizing the appearance of tab bar items.

items.name: init(style: UITabBarItemAppearance.Style)
items.desc: Creates an appearance object with appropriate default values for a tab bar, displaying its items with the specified layout style.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates an appearance object with default values for a stacked tab bar item.

items.name: func configureWithDefault(for: UITabBarItemAppearance.Style)
items.desc: Configures the tab bar item appearance object with appropriate values for the specified style.

items.name: enum UITabBarItemAppearance.Style
items.desc: Constants indicating the layout of a tab bar item's content.

items.name: var normal: UITabBarItemStateAppearance
items.desc: The appearance data to apply to the tab bar item when it is enabled, unselected, and not the focused item.

items.name: var selected: UITabBarItemStateAppearance
items.desc: The appearance data to apply to the tab bar item when it is selected.

items.name: var disabled: UITabBarItemStateAppearance
items.desc: The appearance data to apply to the tab bar item when it is disabled.

items.name: var focused: UITabBarItemStateAppearance
items.desc: The appearance data to apply to the tab bar item when it is focused.
